title: Lifehacks for Developers
keywords: soft skills, leadership for developers, how to become a software architect, how to become a team lead, becoming a technical leader
metaDescription: Practical workshop for developers, where you will build exceptional leadership, communication and problem-solving skills (aka Soft Skills).
description: Practical workshop for developers, where you will build exceptional leadership, communication and problem-solving skills. Skills that will make you the key asset in any modern technology organization.
audience: Software developers willing to achieve career success by gaining some superskills. Geeks are welcome!
certification: You earn a Certificate of Accomplishment after completing the homework assignment.
language: The course is taught in English. Non-native speakers are welcome!
